head.supplied: ¶ Permit me, highly esteemed Professor, to introduce to you Mr Ed. Ramsay, the energetic and talented curator of the Sydney Museum. This gentleman, as you will remember, has also at my request caught...

div.p: MSS.562, Letters to E. P. Ramsay, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: MS enclosed with M to E. Ramsay, 7 February 1883. 7/2/83

Erlauben Sie mir, hochgeehrter Herr Professor, Ihnen Mr Ed. Ramsay, den rüstigen und talentvollen Curator des Sydney-Museums vorzustellen. Dieser Herr, wie Sie erinnern werden, hat beim Fischen mit dem Schleppnetz auf meinen Wunsch auch nach Algen gehascht, u. obgleich die Küste von Neu Süd Wallis eigentlich arm an Algen ist, könnte er nach besonderer Instruction von Ihnen doch vielleicht noch Manches Neue auffinden für die Algologie.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: Permit me, highly esteemed Professor, to introduce to you Mr Ed. Ramsay, the energetic and talented curator of the Sydney Museum. This gentleman, as you will remember, has also at my request caught algae in fishing with the dragnet, and although the coast of New South Wales is in reality poor in algae, he could following your special instruction yet perhaps discover many new things for algology.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
